annotations:
Ref: 00534496 2024/08/27 15.27
A.M.G. Chartering S.r.l.
Via Scarsellini 119 - 16149  Genoa (Italy)
Ph +39.010.582245 - Fax  +39.010.585762
Email: dry@amgchartering.com
gd day
pls offer for:
When proposing vessel please send IMO number, full description including pocket/hold plan with dimensions, Class & Pandi certificates and full itinerary fm now till eta load port.
Pls offer Yr best for:
- acct ArcelorMittal Logistics Belgium as agents for and obo ArcelorMittal Spain
- sid - box - iacs class & highest pandi - approved under AM vetting
- owners to check and satisfy themselves with all restrictions/about vessel’s suitability to enter the ports of loading & discharge
- Cargo: 5’000 mt HRC 5% molchopt
- loadport: 1SB Aviles
- disport: 1 SB Ravenna (Italy)
- Remarks & Cargo Break down:
hrc - stowage max 2 tiers high; weight: max 28,5 mt uw
- laycan: 28-29 August 2024
- Freight FIOS lsd 'all in' incl isps/eu ets/baf/caf or any other surcharge less 2,50% add com to AMLB + 1.25pct to amg
- Freight to be settled within 15 bdays after s/r B’s/L and receipt of freight invoice
- laytime at load: 3500 mt pwwd sshex fri 5 pm mon 8 am ntc eiu
- laytime at discharge: 2500 mt pwwd sshex fri 5 pm mon 8 am ntc eiu
- Demurrage xxxx pdpr fd bends
- chabends:
at Aviles: ALGEPOSA: agency.aviles@algeposa.com | Shipping Agency
Puerto de ArcelorMittal – Dársena San Agustín | 33401 Avilés, Asturias
t: +34 985 515 803 m: +34 609 987 890 / +34 628 718 619 / +34 609 062 996
at Ravenna: AMLIT // as general agents
c/o SPEDRA SHIPPING AGENCY
Via Classicana 99
48122 Ravenna
PH +39 0544 436401
FX +39 0544 436316
MOB PH +39 335 6170655
E-mail: spedra@grupposetramar.it
mmaraldi@grupposetramar.it
- chopt to issue MR only without BL
- chopt to discharge under agents' custody (without loi) in case original bl (if issued) not on time at the port of disch
- Owners as declared in fixing terms to be the entity issuing the freight invoice (letter head paper) and to be as well the freight beneficiary.
The bank's details as mentioned in fixing terms will be the ones to which freight payment will be made with no change allowed after fixing.
- owise as per AMS Gencon 76 c/p terms & conditions V7 incl bimco sanction clause
- sub stem /charterers’ final reconfirmation / shippers & receivers’ approval
- end
brgrds
Ambrogio
mob 0039 335 53 63 313
IF U NEED ASSISTANCE  IN ALL ITALIAN AND SOUTH FRANCE PORTS PLEASE ADDRESS YOUR REQUESTS TO OUR SISTER COMPANY:
MEDOV SRL  - VIA SCARSELLINI 119, 16149 GENOVA  - TEL  +39 010 5490262 - hub.agency@medov.it
"The information contained in this e-mail and any attachments is
confidential and may well also be legally privileged. If you are not
among the named recipients, please notify sender immediately by reply
e-mail and then delete this message from your system, do not use the
contents for any purpose whatsoever nor disclose them to anyone else.
Le informazioni contenute in questo messaggio di posta elettronica
sono riservate e confidenziali e ne e' vietata la diffusione in
qualunque modo eseguita. Qualora Lei non fosse la persona a cui il
presente messaggio e' destinato, La invitiamo ad eliminarlo e a non
utilizzare in alcun caso il suo contenuto, dandone gentilmente
comunicazione al mittente."
